Special thanks to various people whose software is used here:

The creators of SDL2.
The creators of SDL2_image, SDL2_mixer, and SDL2_image.
The creators of several third-party libraries, including:

Joe Drago, for libavif.
VideoLAN and dav1d authors, for obu.c
Emmanuel Gil Peyrot, for gdk-pixbuf.
Balló György, for libgme.
Xiph.org, for libogg and libopusfile.
Xiph.Org, Skype Limited, Octasic, Jean-Marc Valin, Timothy B. Terriberry, CSIRO, Gregory Maxwell, Mark Borgerding, and Erik de Castro Lopo, for libopus.
Sam Leffler and Silicon Graphics, for libtiff
David Bryant, for libwavpack.
Google, for libwebp
Claudio Matsuoka and Hipolito Carraro Jr, for libxmp.
